EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Dark Apostate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one, grants you +5 Negative Healing Amplification and +5 Negative, Light, and Alignment Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Shadow Shrouding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alternate Form: Shroud yourself in Necromantic Energies and assume the form of a Shadow. While in Shadow form, you are considered an Undead, gain a base 100% Fortification, and may heal from Negative Energies. This healing comes at a cost - Undead naturally only take 50% healing from Positive Energy and take 100% more damage from Light. You gain +2 Wisdom and +2 Constitution, as well as +5% Incorpreality and Concenalment as your form is partially obscured and intangible.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Shadowform I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shadow Shrouding gains an additional +5% Incorpreality and Concealment (for a total of 10% each).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Shadowform II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Shadow Shrouding gains an additional +5% Incorpreality and Concealment (for a total of 15% each).
Passive: Your Bestow Curse, Doom, and Bane spells no longer have a saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Shadowform III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Shadow Shrouding gains an additional +5% Incorpreality and Concealment (for a total of 20% each).
Passive: +1 Necromancy DC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Master of Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Shadow Shrouding gains an additional +5% Incorpreality and Concealment (for a total of 25% each).
Passive: +4 Wisdom.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Bane
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies are filled with fear and doubt, giving a -1 Penalty to attack rolls and saves against fear on all affected targets. A successful Will save negates this effect. Bane counters and dispels Bless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Apostate's Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal, Hide, and Bluff. Rank 3: +1 Will saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Shadowy Bulwark
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Maximum Hitpoints

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Apostate's Curse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Your Favored Weapons channel the dark energies within you, twisting them into evil versions of themselves - they deal an additional 1d6 Evil Damage on hit (scaling with 100% spellpower).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Traditionalist Caster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power when wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Prayer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gives special favor to you and any allies near you, giving a +1 luck bonus to allies and a -1 penalty to enemies attack rolls, weapon damage, saves, and skill checks, with this buff and debuff increasing in magnitude by 1 every 5 caster levels - max total of 5 at caster level 20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Dark Judgement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you critically hit with a Negative Energy or Alignment-based spell, you gain [3/6/10] Sacred temporary spell points. Rank 3: Your deity's favored weapon is considered a Spellcasting Implement in your hands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] uses of Turn Undead per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Curse I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Apostate's Curse gains 2 additional damage dice, and grants your Favored Weapons Ghost Touch.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Cursed Words
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expens a Turn Undead charge to bestow a Curse to all enemies around you with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Pray for Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Prayer-like spells (Bless, Bane, Prayer) now resonate with Evil energies, dealing 1d6 Evil damage per Caster Level to all enemies. This damage is doubled against enemies that are Cursed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Endless Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Turn Undead uses regenerate at a rate of one every 120 seconds, or [10/20/30]% faster if it already regenerates.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Dark Consumption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expend a Turn Undead charge to steal the lifeforce of target Undead, dealing 1d6 Bane dammage per Character Level. You gain 1d6 Negative Energy Healing per Character Level if you are in any Undead form. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Curse II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Apostate's Curse gains 2 additional damage dice, and grants your Favored Weapons the ability to use Wisdom for their attack and damage mods.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Wisdom I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Blessing of the Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[50/100/150] Incapacitation range.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Return to Dusk
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are in any Undead form, when you are knocked unconscious, you dissolve into shadows, granting you Invisibility and Displacement. After 5 seconds, your body reforms, and you are healed for 1d6 Negative Energy per Character Level. This ability costs one usage of Turn Undead, and may only happen once every 3 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Visage of Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to natural, magical, and supernatural diseases.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Enhanced Curse III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Apostate's Curse gains 2 additional damage dice. On crit, you apply the effects of the Curse spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Wisdom II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Benediction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inflict Wounds spells have no maximum caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Ward of Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants temporary immunity to multiple targets to all forms of alignment-based energy for 1 minute per caster level or until 12 points of energy per caster level (max 120) for each energy type has been absorbed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Necromantic Devotion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 DCs with Necromancy spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Ultimate Heresy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Apostate's Curse gains 2 additional damage dice. On crit, you apply 1d3 stacks of Vulnerability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dark Apostate: Shadows of Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% Negative, Light, and Alignment Spell Critical Chance.
